content: **prism path swoncho knitting pattern by marly bird** wrap yourself in a kaleidoscope of color and cozy comfort with the prism path swoncho a modern stranded colorwork design that s equal parts sweater and poncho with maximum personality this size-inclusive swoncho features a beautifully rounded yoke bursting with row of stranded motifs making it the perfect canvas for playing with color the sample shown uses 10 rich shades but the pattern includes alternate charts and support for 5-color and 7-color versions too so you can customize your palette to fit your stash or your style knit seamlessly from the top down with plenty of guidance and clear charts this design offers a fantastic opportunity to explore stranded knitting techniques in a wearable confidence-building project perfect for advanced beginners ready to try stranded knitting or intermediate knitters looking for a vibrant skill-stretching make pattern details construction top-down seamless swoncho sweater +
